lyrics:
19 contributorsbreak my heart lyricsverse 1
if i had a free spirit
you would probably appreciate it
that day we bonded like chemical brothers

verse 2
i was gonna be a pop star
you wrote it on your wall
little did i know didnt know

verse 3
theres a piece of my heart for you
theres a piece of my heart for you
the pain isnt nothing new ive felt it
theres a piece of my heart for you
theres a piece of my heart for you
i broke it in two for you you can have it

refrain
dont call me a friend heyeyeyey yeahahah
dont call me a friend yeaheheh
dont call me a friend ah heyey yeah
you know its more than that
its more than that

prechorus
im still figuring out
how youre tryna come across
i dont got time for that yeah yeah
ah now you wanna break something uh
you might also likechorus
break my heart ahahh ahah ahah
break my heart ahahh ahah ahah

bridge
and i know as i saw
thats how this goes aint it
aint it kinda fucked up ahh ahahah yeah
when i think about it
when i think about it
when i when i when i

prechorus
ive got friends dont got time for that
i know you wanna break something

chorus
break my heart ahahh ahah ahah
break my heart ahahh ahah ahah
ah nah i cant give up
again

outro sample
so i gave him an ultimatum
and i said i cant just keep living and moving with you all over the united states without a commitment
theres no certainty you know of a future and i wanted to have children and that was important to me so we got married
im not sure i think i wouldve waited to find
i probably wouldve held out longer to get married cause i i just i dont know
you never really know for sure but i had serious doubts when i got married and i i shouldve listened to my heart more
cause when youre young youre idealistic and you think your love is gonna change a person but it really doesnt
they are who they are think it might make slight modifications but they basically are who they are and who you see and who you feel that they are
so be cautious when youre searching and dont just give your love away2embed
